comment.author: 45586426@N06
comment._content: Beautifully composed picture with US navy aircraft carrier CVA-31 USS Bon Homme Richard cruising below. Vought F-8J Crusader 149195 of VF-53 ‘Iron Angels’ as Modex 205, and code NF of Carrier Air Wing Five (CVW-5) with white radome. Built originally as an F8U-2NE, from September 1962 became an F-8E. www.joebaugher.com/navy_fighters/f8_7.html F-8E Crusader 149195 was one of 138 rebuilt as an F-8J: www.joebaugher.com/navy_fighters/f8_12.html F8U-2NE /F-8E/F-8J info courtesy Professor Joe Baugher, Chicago Illinois The above picture may also be viewed on ‘flickr’ here: www.flickr.com/photos/multimediaservices/3389816599/ 1966 picture of F-8E 149195 with VF-191 ‘Satans Kittens’ as Modex 112: (scroll down to page 153 using slider bar on right of PDF document with download option) es.scribd.com/doc/60152224/Vought-s-F-8-Crusader-Navy-Fig... “ VF-191 F-8E 149195 from the USS BON HOMME RICHARD on 2-19-66.” ………………………………………………………………………………………………….. Two 1970 pictures of F-8E 149195: es.scribd.com/doc/60152224/Vought-s-F-8-Crusader-Navy-Fig... scroll down using slider bar on right to page 80 of this major PDF document to view both images of F-8E 149195 as Modex 203, code NF of CVW-5 aboard CVA-31 USS Bon Homme Richard. 1970 color profile of F-8J 149195 may be viewed on this internet webpage: wp.scn.ru/en/ww3/f/812/3/15#131 (look for entry with following caption and click on picture to view) Vought F-8J Crusader 149195, VF-53 as Modex 203, code NF of CVW-5 aboard CVA-31 USS Bon Homme Richard. ………………………………………………………………………………………………….. F-8J 149195 was lost on November 9, 1974 to as yet unknown reason and location: www.ejection-history.org.uk/Aircraft_by_Type/F_8_Crusader... 9th November 1974. USN. F-8J Crusader 149195. VF-211 in the USA. Pilot, Lieutenant. R. A. Smith ejected. ………………………………………………………………………………………………….. French language internet webpage with scale model of and picture including F-8E 149195 when with US Marine Corps unit VMF(AW)-312 tail code DR and side number 007: navy-seventies.pagesperso-orange.fr/F-8%20VMF-312.html (a translation function is available)
